charges.charge_description: ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO - Receiving Child Pornography - During the period beginning on or about September 3, 2015, on and through December 9 ,2015, in Rock Island County the defendant did knowingly receive digital image files of child pornography, in violation of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2252A(a)(2)(A) and (b)(1).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Griffith is sentenced to 240 months on each of Cts. 1-3, to be served concurrently, 15 years supervised release on each of Cts. 1-3 to be served concurrently, no fine, and $300 special assessment fee.

charges.charge_description: ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO - Distributing Child Pornography - during the period beginning on or about September 3, 2015, on and through December 9 ,2015, in Rock Island County the defendant did knowingly distribute digital image files of child pornography in violation of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2252A(a)(2)(A) and (b)(1)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Griffith is sentenced to 240 months on each of Cts. 1-3, to be served concurrently, 15 years supervised release on each of Cts. 1-3 to be served concurrently, no fine, and $300 special assessment fee.

charges.charge_description: ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO - Possessing Child Pornography - on or about December 15 ,2015, in Rock Island County the defendant did knowingly possess visual depictions of child pornography, in violation of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2252A(a)(5)(B) and (b)(2). Forfeiture Allegations in violation of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2253.(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Griffith is sentenced to 240 months on each of Cts. 1-3, to be served concurrently, 15 years supervised release on each of Cts. 1-3 to be served concurrently, no fine, and $300 special assessment fee.
